languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and deals +100% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10% and -5 to all stats if Overseer has Hereticus-2. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.original_text:
Киберорел получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и +100% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}.
Когда он {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от вражеской атаки, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блок{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и уклонение атаковавшего уменьшаются на 10%. Суммируется и длится до конца боя.

traits.locale_text:

Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10%. If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, that enemy suffers an additional −5 penalty to all characteristics. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, that enemy suffers an additional −5 penalty to all characteristics. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10%. If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, that enemy suffers an additional −5 penalty to all characteristics. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and deals +100% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's block, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10%. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text:
Siber kartal, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği kazanır ve +%100 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
Bir düşman saldırısından {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} o düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g}, kaçınma ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerleri %10 azalır. Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahipse aynı düşman tüm niteliklerine ayrıca −5 ceza puanı alır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

traits.locale_text:
Siber kartal, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği kazanır ve +%100 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
Bir düşman saldırısından {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} o düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g}, kaçınma ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerleri %10 azalır. Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahipse aynı düşman tüm niteliklerine ayrıca −5 ceza puanı alır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

Siber kartal, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği kazanır ve +%100 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
Bir düşman saldırısından kaçındığında o düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerleri %10 azalır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text:
La ciberáguila recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} e inflige un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
Cuando {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} el ataque de un enemigo, el {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqueo{/g}, la esquiva, y la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del enemigo se reducen un −10 %. Si el supervisor tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Partidario, el enemigo también sufre una penalización −5 a todas sus características. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and deals +100% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10%. If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, that enemy suffers an additional −5 penalty to all characteristics. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
La ciberáguila recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} e inflige un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
Cuando {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} el ataque de un enemigo, el {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqueo{/g}, la esquiva, y la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del enemigo se reducen un −10 %. Si el supervisor tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Partidario, el enemigo también sufre una penalización −5 a todas sus características. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.

La ciberáguila recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} e inflige un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño adicional{/g}.
Cada vez que {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque enemigo, reduce en un −10 % el bloqueo, la esquiva y la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} de ese enemigo. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.

La ciberáguila recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} e inflige un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño adicional{/g}.
Cada vez que {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque enemigo, reduce en un −10 % el {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqueo{/g}, la esquiva y la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} de ese enemigo. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.

languages.text:
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高10点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。
每当生化猎鹰{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}敌人的攻击时，该名敌人的闪避、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}均降低10%。如果监察官拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者，则该名敌人所有属性降低5点。上述效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and deals +100% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10%. If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, that enemy suffers an additional −5 penalty to all characteristics. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

每当生化猎鹰{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}敌人的攻击时，该名敌人的闪避、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}均降低10%。如果监察官拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者，则该名敌人所有属性降低5点。上述效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高10点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。
每当生化猎鹰{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}敌人的攻击时，该名敌人的闪避、格挡、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}均降低10%。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und verursacht +100 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
Wenn er dem Angriff eines Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, werden {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocken{/g}, Ausweichen und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} dieses Gegners um −10 % reduziert. Hat der Aufseher {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Anhänger, hat der Gegner einen weiteren Abzug von −5 auf alle Eigenschaften. Dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text:

Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10%. If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, that enemy suffers an additional −5 penalty to all characteristics. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und verursacht +100 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
Wenn er dem Angriff eines Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, werden {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocken{/g}, Ausweichen und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} dieses Gegners um −10 % reduziert. Hat der Aufseher {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Anhänger, hat der Gegner einen weiteren Abzug von −5 auf alle Eigenschaften. Dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Stapelbar.

Der Cyber-Adler erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und verursacht +100 % mehr Schaden.
Wenn er dem Angriff eines Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, werden Blocken, Ausweichen und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} dieses Gegners um –10 % verringert. Hält bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Stapelbar.

languages.text:
Le cyber-aigle gagne +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et inflige +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
Chaque fois qu'il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} l'attaque d'un ennemi, le {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocage{/g}, l'esquive et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de cet ennemi sont réduits de -10 %. Si le surveillant possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Partisan, cet ennemi subit une pénalité supplémentaire de -5 à toutes ses caractéristiques. Dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and deals +100% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10%. If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, that enemy suffers an additional −5 penalty to all characteristics. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-aigle gagne +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et inflige +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
Chaque fois qu'il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} l'attaque d'un ennemi, le {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocage{/g}, l'esquive et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de cet ennemi sont réduits de -10 %. Si le surveillant possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Partisan, cet ennemi subit une pénalité supplémentaire de -5 à toutes ses caractéristiques. Dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de +10 et inflige +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
Chaque fois qu'il esquive l'attaque d'un ennemi, le blocage, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de cet ennemi sont réduits de -10 %. Dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de +10 et inflige +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
Chaque fois qu'il esquive l'attaque d'un ennemi, le blocage, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de cet ennemi sont réduits de -10 %. Dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}が+10され、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+100%上昇する。
敵の攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}した場合、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}、回避、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が-10%低下する。監督者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端{/g} — 門下生の場合、敵はすべての特性に追加で−5のペナルティを受ける。戦闘終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and deals +100% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Whenever it {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy's attack, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, dodge, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} are reduced by −10%. If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, that enemy suffers an additional −5 penalty to all characteristics. Lasts until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーイーグルの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}が+10され、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+100%上昇する。
敵の攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}した場合、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}、回避、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が-10%低下する。監督者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端{/g} — 門下生の場合、敵はすべての特性に追加で−5のペナルティを受ける。戦闘終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。

サイバーイーグルの敏捷性が+10され、与えるダメージが+100%上昇する。
敵の攻撃を回避した場合、その敵のブロック、回避、受け流しが-10%低下する。戦闘終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。

サイバーイーグルの敏捷性が+10され、与えるダメージが+100%上昇する。
敵の攻撃を回避した場合、その敵のブロック、回避、受け流しが-10%低下する。戦闘終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text:
Киберорел получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и наносит на 100% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Когда он {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от вражеской атаки, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блок{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и уклонение атаковавшего уменьшаются на 10%. Если надзиратель обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — сторонник, атаковавший также получает штраф −5 ко всем характеристикам. Суммируется и длится до конца боя.
